thread.title: BRIEF-Lippert Acquires Window And Glass Business Of Hehr International

title: BRIEF-Lippert Acquires Window And Glass Business Of Hehr International
text: February 16, 2018 / 9:17 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-Lippert Acquires Window And Glass Business Of Hehr International Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Lci Industries: * LIPPERT COMPONENTS ACQUIRES WINDOW AND GLASS BUSINESS OF HEHR INTERNATIONAL INC. * LCI INDUSTRIES - ‍WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY ACQUIRED SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF BUSINESS ASSETS OF HEHR INTERNATIONAL INC​ * LCI INDUSTRIES - ‍HEHR TEAM WILL REMAIN WITH LCI TO LEAD ACQUIRED BUSINESS UNDER DIRECTION OF JOSH ROAN, VICE PRESIDENT OF OPERATIONS​ * LCI INDUSTRIES - ‍EXPECT ACQUISITION TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO LCI‘S EARNINGS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
